heading: Tonight
text: Partly clear, with periods of clouds. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s, nearing 50 along Lake Champlain. Light wind, becoming south to southeast at 5 to 10 mph, with gusts increasing to 20 mph through the Champlain Valley.

heading: Sunday
text: Partly sunny with increasing clouds from the west. Highs from the mid 60s to near 70 east, low to mid 70s west. South wind increasing to 10 to 15 mph east, gusting 25 to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Becoming mostly cloudy, as steady rain and showers increase, spreading east overnight. Lows from the upper 40s to mid 50s in the Champlain Valley. Southeast wind 10 to 15 mph, gusting up to 30 mph west of the Greens.
